conversationHistory.userMessage: What's a quick meal plan for tomorrow with 300 BDT budget?
conversationHistory.botResponse:
Hello! I can help you with a quick, budget-friendly meal plan for tomorrow.

• Breakfast: Egg and vegetable paratha (2 eggs: 20 BDT, vegetables: 30 BDT, flour: 20 BDT). Total: 70 BDT

• Lunch: Rice with lentil soup (dal) and fried vegetables (rice: 30 BDT, dal: 20 BDT, vegetables: 30 BDT). Total: 80 BDT

• Dinner: Chicken khichuri (rice: 40 BDT, lentils: 30 BDT, chicken: 80 BDT). Total: 150 BDT

• Cheaper alternative: Replace chicken with eggs or vegetables to reduce cost.

Shopping tip: Buy vegetables from local markets for better prices.

Next step: Check your pantry to see what ingredients you already have to further reduce costs.
